name: ccg-workflows
description: CCG 工作流插件集 - 可插拔的开发工作流增强

plugins.name: commit
plugins.description: 规范提交工作流：收集 → 分析 → 生成消息 → 更新 Changelog → 执行

plugins.name: tpd
plugins.description: TPD 工作流：thinking → plan → dev（支持 OpenSpec 交接）

plugins.name: ui-design
plugins.description: UI/UX 设计工作流：需求分析 → 样式推荐 → 设计生成（并行 3 变体）→ UX 检查 → 代码生成（双模型协作）→ 质量验证

plugins.name: brainstorm
plugins.description: 头脑风暴工作流：主题研究 → 多模型发散 → 创意评估 → 报告生成

plugins.name: hooks
plugins.description: 通用钩子集合：意图评估、日志备份、代码质量、智能路由、安全防护、会话管理

plugins.name: context-memory
plugins.description: 智能上下文管理：上下文加载 → 会话压缩 → 代码地图 → 技能索引 → 工作流记忆 → 风格记忆 → 文档管理

plugins.name: refactor
plugins.description: 代码重构工作流：模式识别 → 重构方案 → 安全验证 → 自动应用

plugins.name: code-review
plugins.description: Multi-perspective parallel code review with Agent Team (Fan-Out/Fan-In + cross-validation)

plugins.name: security-audit
plugins.description: Cross-layer security audit with Agent Team (Fan-Out/Fan-In + Debate pattern)

plugins.name: feature-impl
plugins.description: Feature implementation pipeline with Agent Team (planner + implementer + parallel validation)

plugins.name: tdd
plugins.description: Test-Driven Development pipeline with Agent Team (test-writer → implementer → coverage-validator)

plugins.name: bug-investigation
plugins.description: Multi-angle bug investigation with Agent Team (Fan-Out: log-analyst + code-tracer + reproducer)

plugins.name: database-design
plugins.description: Database design with Agent Team Debate pattern (schema-designer vs query-optimizer)

plugins.name: refactor-team
plugins.description: Team-based refactoring pipeline (analyzer → refactorer → reviewer) with safety validation

plugins.name: plan-execute
plugins.description: CSV-driven plan-execute pipeline with Agent Team (investigator → CSV contract → implementer + reviewer per-issue loop)
